Swift Mailer Documentation

The following documentation covers the latest version of Swift Mailer; Version 3.

  • If you're still looking for version 2 documentation, look here

Swift Mailer 3

Version 3 is the latest release. It offers many beneficial changes over Version 2. You would gain more from using the new API in Version 3, but if you prefer the Version 2 API try EasySwift.
